slam.frontend_manager.handlers.pointcloud_matcher module

class slam.frontend_manager.handlers.pointcloud_matcher.ScanMatcher(config: KissIcpScanMatcherConfig)[source]

Bases: Handler

Handler computes the transformation between two point clouds based on Kiss-ICP method: https://github.com/PRBonn/kiss-icp.

__init__(config: KissIcpScanMatcherConfig) → None[source]
Parameters:

config – handler configuration with parameters for Kiss-ICP scan matcher.

static to_kiss_icp_config(config: KissIcpScanMatcherConfig) → KISSConfig[source]

Creates KissICP config with parameters from the handler config.

Parameters:

config – handler config.

Returns:

KissICP config.

tuple_to_array(values: tuple[float, ...]) → ndarray[source]

Converts raw lidar data to numpy array of shape [N,3].

Parameters:

values – raw lidar scan data.

Returns:

raw values as a numpy array [N,3].

static _transformation(pose_i: ndarray, pose_j: ndarray) → ndarray[source]

Computes the transformation between two poses: T = inv(Pi) @ Pj.

Parameters:

  • pose_i (np.ndarray) – SE(3) matrix.

  • pose_j (np.ndarray) – SE(3) matrix.

Returns:

transformation matrix SE(3).

_create_measurement(tf: ndarray) → Measurement[source]

Creates the measurement with the computed transformation matrix.

Parameters:

tf – transformation matrix SE(3).

Returns:

measurement with the transformation matrix.

_update_queues()[source]

Remove the oldest element and pose from the queue.

process(element: Element) → Measurement | None[source]

Computes the transformation SE(3) matrix between 2 point clouds. Always returns None for the very first element, as the transformation can not be computed for a single point cloud.

Parameters:

element – element with raw pointcloud data.

Returns:

measurement or None.

Raises:

TypeError – if the sensor is not an instance of Lidar3D.

slam.frontend_manager.handlers.prior module

Simple handler for prior measurements.

Is used only for instantiation of the Measurement object.
